Uses of Package
controller.factories

Packages that use controller.factories
controller.factories   
gui.panels   
 

Classes in controller.factories used by controller.factories
Address
          This is an abstract class for displayed forms of addresses.
BundleBuilder
          This class creates a new instance of class Locale accordingly to a country.
Date
          Class which creates a String which contains a date for a letter.
FactoryAddressee
          This class defines which address object will be used for the displayed form of the addressee.
FactoryAddresser
          This class defines which address object will be used for the displayed form of the addresser.
FactoryDate
          This class defines which date object will be used for the displayed form of the date.
FactoryText
          This class defines which text object will be used for the displayed form of the text.
LocaleBuilderTargetLanguage
          This class creates a new instance of class Locale accordingly to the selected target language.
Text
          This is an abstract class for displayed forms of text.
 

Classes in controller.factories used by gui.panels
DocumentBuilder
          This class provides displayable forms of texts, dates and addresses to other classes.
